parameters.content:
## Phase 1: Discovery
Fast search via python-jobspy. No descriptions.
200 results per category, random 7-15s between requests.

## Phase 2: Enrichment
Parallel detail page scraping via proxy worker pool.
20 proxies with browser fingerprints, 7-15s delay per proxy.

## Error Handling
All errors → Telegram notification → clear running flag

nodes.name: Check Running
nodes.notes: Prevents overlapping executions. Skips if previous run is still active (14 min timeout).

nodes.name: Build Queries
nodes.notes: Generates searchTerm × location combinations. 5 locations × N categories.

nodes.name: Fetch Jobs
nodes.notes: Phase 1 search. No descriptions. python-jobspy round-robins proxies internally.

nodes.name: Collect & Dedup
nodes.notes: Deduplicates jobs by URL across categories. Outputs single item.

nodes.name: Check URLs
nodes.notes: Shared sub-workflow. Returns {existingUrls: []} from Kotlin API.

nodes.name: Filter New
nodes.notes: Keeps only jobs not yet in database.

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ jobs: $json.newJobs.map(j => ({ url: j.url, job_id: j.url.split('/').pop(), date_posted: j.publishedAt || '' })), proxies: $json.proxyList, delay_min: 7, delay_max: 15 }) }}

nodes.name: Enrich Jobs
nodes.notes: Phase 2. Parallel enrichment: 20 proxies × fingerprints, 7-15s delay.

nodes.name: Build Ingest
nodes.notes: Merges search data + enriched data. Enriched company_name/location override search values.

nodes.name: Build Stats
nodes.notes: Builds Telegram notification. info/warn/error based on enrichment stats.

nodes.name: Clear Running
nodes.notes: Releases the execution lock so next scheduled run can proceed.

nodes.name: Clear Running on Error
nodes.notes: Releases the execution lock on error path.
